revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #57 Rowap |image = [[File:Rowap.png]] |caption = In days of old, people worked the top-shaped pieces of this Berry free and used them as toys. |growtime = 5h 54m 0s |harvest = 1 berry |replant = 5% |points = 2,900 |flavor =
*10 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *40 sour }} '''Rowap''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least one empty plot and at least 600 points of sour on the field. The [[Belue]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 hour 36 mins || 2 hours 30 mins || 3 hours 54 mins || 5 hours 54 mins - 11 hours 48 mins |- ! Animation |

[[File:RowapTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RowapTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
